```{r}
clean_cake_recipe %>% 
    view()
```

Which cake has the most cocoa in it?

```{r}
clean_cake_recipe %>% 
    filter(ingredient == "Cocoa") %>% 
    top_n(1, value)
    
```

For sponge cake, how many cups of ingredients are used in total?
```{r}
clean_cake_recipe %>% 
    filter(Cake == "Sponge", measure == "cup") %>% 
    summarise(total_cups_ingredients = sum(value))
```

How many ingredients are measured in teaspoons?
```{r}
clean_cake_recipe %>% 
    filter(measure == "teaspoon") %>% 
    group_by(ingredient) %>% 
    summarise(sum(value)) %>% 
    count
```

Which cake has the most unique ingredients?
```{r}
unique_ingredients <- clean_cake_recipe %>% 
    filter(value > 0) %>%
    count(ingredient) %>% 
    filter(n == 1) %>% 
    select(ingredient)

class(unique_ingredients) <- as.vector(unique_ingredients)

clean_cake_recipe %>%
    filter(value > 0, ingredient %in% unique_ingredients$ingredient) %>%
   count(Cake) %>% 
top_n(1)    %>% 
    view()

```
Which ingredients are used only once?

```{r}
unique_ingredients$ingredient
```
